Erlanger-Elsmere Board of Education names Chad Molley district’s next superintendent

span.p: The Board of Education of Erlanger-Elsmere Independent Schools is pleased to announce the selection of Mr. Chad Molley as the district’s next superintendent, effective August 1, 2020.

a.title: Click to read more about: Erlanger-Elsmere Board of Education names Chad Molley district’s next superintendent

div.a: Read More about Erlanger-Elsmere Board of Education names Chad Molley district’s next superintendent
We need YOUR Help: The 2020 Census is here, and the stakes for Kentucky could not be higher!

span.p: Many of the programs our schools, our cities, our state and our non-profits rely on need this data for funding. These are programs such as food services, educational, services, special education, federal programs, federal grants, roads, transportation, and other programs that are assisting our communities right now during this difficult time. Every 10 years, the United States government conducts the Census — a national accounting of everyone living in every state. A complete count is crucial so that Kentucky gets its fair share of federal funds for the next 10 years. Even though we are navigating a difficult time because of COVID-19, there couldn’t be a more important moment to fill out the census. Census data is used to determine school funding, federal disaster relief, hospital funding, Medicare, Medicaid, and more.
As of this week only 51.8% of Elsmere Residents and 58.1% of Erlanger Residents had completed their Census Data. Please do your part and complete your Census today. Thank you!
Registration for the Erlanger-Elsmere Preschool program is now underway. For more information, please click the link to the left named Preschool Registration.
For the flyer, please click here.

p.br:
The Erlanger-Elsmere Schools will provide essential opportunities for all students to reach their greatest potential.
Mission
It is the mission of the Erlanger-Elsmere Schools to embrace and attend to the individual needs of our students, regardless of the obstacles.
